properties.displayName: Potential Memory Dumping Activity Via LiveKD
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\livekd.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\livekd64.exe") or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "livekd.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of LiveKD based on PE metadata or image name
